item.title: 2020 CTF
item.description: Last update: July 2, 2020 09:52 BSidesTLV 2020 CTF prizes are sponsored by https://HackTheBox.eu/ CTF starts in: var countDownDate = new Date("Jun 27, 2020 09:00:00").getTime(); var tick = function() { var now = new Date().getTime(); var distance = countDownDate - now; var days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); var hours = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60)); var minutes = Math.
